government.name: Iran Open Data Portal
government.description: National portal for open government datasets and catalog (in Persian and English)

government.name: Iran Open Data Center (IOD)
government.description: A pioneer platform providing access to official government public data and statistics

financial.name: Tehran Stock Exchange (TSE)
financial.description: Iran’s largest stock market providing trading data and listings

financial.name: Central Securities Depository of Iran (CSDI)
financial.description: Provides post-trade services: clearing, settlement and securities registration for Iran’s capital market

society.name: Statistical Center of Iran (SCI)
society.description: Provides demographic, social, and economic data including censuses, population indices, and educational statistics.

society.name: Institute for Humanities and Cultural Studies
society.description: Offers research articles, theses, and reports in the fields of humanities and social sciences.

society.name: National Library and Archives of Iran
society.description: Digital access to books, journals, manuscripts, and cultural documents of Iran.

society.name: Research Center of the Iranian Parliament
society.description: Publishes social and cultural research reports, policy analyses, and decision-support data.

research.name: IranDoc
research.description: Iranian research institute platform providing access to theses, dissertations, and academic publications.

research.name: SID (Scientific Information Database)
research.description: Database of Iranian scientific articles and journals, indexed by topic and discipline.

research.name: Magiran
research.description: Digital archive of Iranian journals and newspapers, providing access to full-text issues.

research.name: Noormags
research.description: Database of Iranian academic, research, and cultural journals, offering full-text access.

research.name: Civilica
research.description: Platform providing access to papers from Iranian conferences and national/international scientific events.

judicial.name: Official Gazette of Iran
judicial.description: Government-owned platform under the Judiciary for publishing laws, regulations, court rulings, and legal company announcements, as well as handling official printing and publishing orders.

judicial.name: Rasmio
judicial.description: An open‑data business‑registry platform in Iran that provides company verification, official gazette‑based data, and business‑relationship analytics.

judicial.name: Edaalat.org
judicial.description: A platform that has published leaked data from Iran's Judiciary, including 3,437,401 case records from 2008 to early 2023.

business.name: Official Gazette of Iran
business.description: Publishes company establishment, changes, trademark registrations, and other legal announcements.

business.name: Rasmio
business.description: Open-data business platform offering company verification, official gazette-based data, and business relationship analytics.

business.name: Municipal Property Portals (e.g., Tehran Municipality)
business.description: Provides urban property information, ownership records, and municipal real estate data.
